warscrolls.name: Abhorrant Archregent
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Wizard (1), Infantry, Ward (6+), Death, Flesh-eater Courts, Abhorrant

abilities.name: Musicians, Play!
abilities.effect: While you believe this **DELUSION**, subtract 1 from hit rolls for shooting attacks that target friendly **FLESH‑EATER COURTS** units while they are wholly within 12" of a friendly **FLESH‑EATER COURTS HERO**.

abilities.name: Countless Servants
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Hero Phase
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **SERFS** or **KNIGHTS** unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect:
Roll a dice. On a 3+:

• If the target is a **SERFS** unit, you can return up to 3 slain models to that unit.
• If the target is a **KNIGHTS** unit, you can return 1 slain model to that unit.

warscrolls.name: Abhorrant Cardinal
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Priest (1), Infantry, Ward (6+), Death, Flesh-eater Courts, Abhorrant

abilities.name: Insular Contemplations
abilities.effect: While this unit is more than 6" from all enemy units, add 1 to chanting rolls for this unit.

abilities.name: Banishing Liturgy
abilities.effect:
While you believe this **DELUSION**:

•  Add 2 to banishment rolls for friendly **FLESH‑EATER COURTS** units.
•  Friendly **FLESH‑EATER COURTS** units have **WARD (4+)** against damage points inflicted by **SPELL** abilities, **PRAYER** abilities and abilities used by **MANIFESTATIONS**.

warscrolls.name: Abhorrant Ghoul King
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Wizard (1), Infantry, Ward (6+), Death, Flesh-eater Courts, Abhorrant

abilities.name: Vassals, to Arms!
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Reaction: You declared a FIGHT ability for this unit
abilities.effect: Pick a friendly **SERFS** unit that has not used a **FIGHT** ability this turn and is within this unit’s combat range to be the target. The target can be picked to use a **FIGHT** ability immediately after the **FIGHT** ability used by this unit has been resolved. If it is picked to do so, add 1 to wound rolls for the target’s attacks for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Code of Honour
abilities.effect: While you believe this **DELUSION**, add 1 to the Damage characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly non-**UNIQUE FLESH‑EATER COURTS HEROES** for attacks that target an enemy **HERO**.

warscrolls.name: Abhorrant Ghoul King on Royal Terrorgheist
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Monster, Wizard (1), Fly, Ward (6+), Death, Flesh-eater Courts, Abhorrant

abilities.name: Necromantic Limits
abilities.effect:
This unit’s **Terrorgheist’s Skeletal Talons** have a maximum Attacks characteristic of 10.

While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its **Terrorgheist’s Skeletal Talons** is 4.

abilities.name: Wicked Predator
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: For each champion, standard bearer and musician in the target unit, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit’s **Terrorgheist’s Skeletal Talons**, to a maximum of 10, for the rest of the phase. Those additional attacks must target that enemy unit.

abilities.name: Ferocious Hunger
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made with this unit’s **Companion** melee weapons for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: A Majestic Menagerie
abilities.effect: While you believe this **DELUSION**, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of **Companion** melee weapons used by friendly **FLESH‑EATER COURTS** units while they are wholly within 12" of any friendly **FLESH‑EATER COURTS HEROES**.

warscrolls.name: Abhorrant Ghoul King on Royal Zombie Dragon
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Monster, Wizard (1), Fly, Ward (6+), Death, Flesh-eater Courts, Abhorrant

abilities.name: Necromantic Limits
abilities.effect:
This unit’s **Draconic Claws** have a maximum Attacks characteristic of 10.

While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its **Draconic Claws** is 5.

abilities.name: Monstrous Hunger
abilities.effect: While they are wholly within 12" of this unit, friendly non-**HERO FLESH‑EATER COURTS MONSTERS** can use **CHARGE** abilities even if they used a **RUN** ability in the same turn.

abilities.name: For The Kingdom!
abilities.effect:
While you believe this **DELUSION**, add 1 to charge rolls for friendly Knights units and friendly **FLESH-EATER COURTS MONSTERS** while they are wholly within 12" of any friendly **FLESH-EATER COURTS HEROES**.

Add 2 to charge rolls for friendly **KNIGHTS** units and friendly **FLESH-EATER COURTS MONSTERS** instead while they are wholly within 12" of any friendly **Abhorrant Ghoul Kings on Royal Zombie Dragons**.

abilities.name: Draconic Terror
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. If the roll exceeds the target’s Control characteristic, the target cannot use commands for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Abhorrant Gorewarden
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Wizard (1), Infantry, Fly, Ward (6+), Death, Flesh-eater Courts, Abhorrant

abilities.name: Lord of the Marches
abilities.declare: Pick this unit and up to 2 friendly **FLESH‑EATER COURTS** units in this unit’s regiment that have not been deployed to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Set up the target units in reserve **patrolling the borders**. They have now been deployed.

abilities.name: Trespassers!
abilities.declare: Pick this unit if it is **patrolling the borders**, then pick an enemy unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Set up this unit more than 6" from the target and more than 9" from all other enemy units. Then, set up the units that were **patrolling the borders** with this unit wholly within 12" of this unit and more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Defenders of the Kingdom
abilities.effect:
While you believe this **DELUSION** and this unit is on the battlefield, add 1 to charge rolls for friendly **FLESH‑EATER COURTS** units while they are wholly within 12" of a friendly **FLESH‑EATER COURTS HERO**. Add 2 to charge rolls instead if they were also set up in the same turn.

When using the ‘A Kingdom Deluded’ ability, you can pick this **DELUSION** even if this unit is **patrolling the borders**.

warscrolls.name: Cadaverous Barricade
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Manifestation, Endless Spell, Ward (6+), Death, Flesh-eater Courts

abilities.name: Grasping Hands
abilities.effect:
Enemy units cannot use **RUN** or **RETREAT** abilities while they are within this **MANIFESTATION**’s combat range.
In addition, if an enemy unit is picked to use a **MOVE** ability while it is within this **MANIFESTATION**’s combat range, halve that unit’s Move characteristic (rounding up) for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Chalice of Ushoran
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Manifestation, Endless Spell, Ward (6+), Death, Flesh-eater Courts

abilities.name: Draughts of Delusion
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit within 6" of this **MANIFESTATION** to be the target.
abilities.effect:
Roll a dice. On a 3+, your opponent must pick 1 of the following to apply for the rest of the turn:

***Drink Deep from the Chalice:*** Other than the **Companion** weapon ability, weapon abilities for attacks made by the target have no effect.

***Turn Aside and Suffer the Consequences:*** Combat attacks that target that enemy unit score critical hits on unmodified hit rolls of 5+.

warscrolls.name: Charnel Throne
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Faction Terrain, Death, Flesh-eater Courts

abilities.name: Reigning Champion
abilities.declare: If this terrain feature does not have a Steward, pick a friendly **FLESH‐EATER COURTS INFANTRY HERO** within 3" of it and not in combat to be the target.
abilities.effect: Place the target on this terrain feature. The target is now the Steward (see ‘Steward of the Realm’).

abilities.name: Ruler of All They Survey
abilities.declare: If this terrain feature has a Steward, pick a visible friendly non-**HERO FLESH-EATER COURTS** unit that is not in combat to be the target.
abilities.effect: The target can move D3". If the target was set up this turn, it can move D6" instead. It cannot move into combat during that move.

abilities.name: Duty Calls
abilities.effect: If this terrain feature has a Steward that was not placed on it this turn, set up the Steward on the battlefield wholly within 6" of this terrain feature and not in combat. That unit is no longer the Steward.

abilities.name: Steward of the Realm
abilities.effect:
While this terrain feature has a Steward:

• The Steward cannot use **MOVE** abilities.
• Instead of measuring range or visibility to the Steward, measure to this terrain feature instead.
• All attacks that would target the Steward target this terrain feature instead.
• If this terrain feature is destroyed, before removing it from the battlefield, inflict D3 mortal damage on the Steward. Then, set up the Steward on the battlefield within 3" of this terrain feature and not in combat. That unit is no longer the Steward. If it is not possible to set up the Steward, it is slain.

warscrolls.name: Corpsemare Stampede
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Manifestation, Endless Spell, Fly, Ward (6+), Death, Flesh-eater Courts

abilities.name: Trampled Underfoot
abilities.declare:
This **MANIFESTATION** can use this ability even if it is in combat.

Pick a point on a battlefield edge to be the target. Then, make a stampede roll of 2D6. Add 1D6 to the roll for each battle round that this **MANIFESTATION** has been on the battlefield and has not been banished. For example, the stampede roll would be 2D6 in the turn in which it was summoned, 3D6 in your next turn, and so on.
abilities.effect:
This **MANIFESTATION** can move a distance up to the value of the stampede roll in a straight line directly towards the target. It can move through the combat ranges of enemy units. It cannot end that move in combat unless it ends that move within ½" of a visible enemy unit. If it does so, this **MANIFESTATION** has charged.

Roll a D3 for each enemy unit that this **MANIFESTATION** passed across during that move. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on that enemy unit equal to the roll.

In addition, if this **MANIFESTATION** charged this turn, add the value of the stampede roll to the Attacks characteristic of this **MANIFESTATION**’s **Corpsemare Trample** for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Crypt Flayers
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Fly, Ward (6+), Death, Flesh-eater Courts, Knights

abilities.name: To Our Liege!
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Movement Phase
abilities.effect: If this unit is not in combat, remove it from the battlefield and set it up again wholly within 12" of a friendly **FLESH‑EATER COURTS HERO** and more than 9" from all enemy units.

warscrolls.name: Crypt Flayers (2 models)
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Fly, Ward (6+), Death, Flesh-eater Courts, Knights

abilities.name: To Our Liege!
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Movement Phase
abilities.effect: If this unit is not in combat, remove it from the battlefield and set it up again wholly within 12" of a friendly **FLESH‑EATER COURTS HERO** and more than 9" from all enemy units.

warscrolls.name: Crypt Ghast Courtier
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Infantry, Ward (6+), Death, Flesh-eater Courts, Noble

abilities.name: Marshal of the Peasantry
abilities.phaseDetails: Reaction: You declared a FIGHT ability for this unit
abilities.effect: Pick a friendly **Crypt Ghouls** unit that has not used a **FIGHT** ability this turn and is within this unit’s combat range to be the target. The target can be picked to use a **FIGHT** ability immediately after the **FIGHT** ability used by this unit has been resolved. If it is picked to do so, add 1 to hit rolls for the target’s attacks for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Crypt Ghouls
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Ward (6+), Death, Flesh-eater Courts, Serfs

abilities.name: Royal Approval
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Rend characteristic of this unit’s melee weapons while it is wholly within 12" of any friendly **NOBLES** or **ABHORRANTS**.

warscrolls.name: Crypt Haunter Courtier
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Infantry, Ward (6+), Death, Flesh-eater Courts, Noble

melee.name: Massive Bone Club and Rancid Talons

abilities.name: Blessed Blood
abilities.effect: **Heal (D3)** this unit.

abilities.name: Knightly Exemplar
abilities.phaseDetails: Reaction: You declared a FIGHT ability for this unit
abilities.effect: Pick a friendly **Crypt Horrors** unit that has not used a **FIGHT** ability this turn and is within this unit’s combat range to be the target. The target can be picked to use a **FIGHT** ability immediately after the **FIGHT** ability used by this unit has been resolved. If it is picked to do so, add 1 to hit rolls for the target’s attacks for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Crypt Horrors
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Ward (6+), Death, Flesh-eater Courts, Knights

abilities.name: Holy Blades of Bone
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll 2 dice for each model in this unit. Add 2 to each roll if the target is **CAVALRY**. For each 5+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

warscrolls.name: Crypt Horrors (2 models)
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Ward (6+), Death, Flesh-eater Courts, Knights

abilities.name: Holy Blades of Bone
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll 2 dice for each model in this unit. Add 2 to each roll if the target is **CAVALRY**. For each 5+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

warscrolls.name: Crypt Infernal Courtier
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Infantry, Fly, Ward (6+), Death, Flesh-eater Courts, Noble

abilities.name: On Winged Steeds
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Movement Phase
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **Crypt Flayers** unit that used the ‘To Our Liege!’ ability this turn and is wholly within 9" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: The target can immediately move D3" but cannot end that move in combat.

abilities.name: Mind-shattering Cacophony
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Shooting Phase
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit that had any damage points allocated to it this turn by attacks made with this unit’s **Piercing Death Screech** to be the target.
abilities.effect: For the rest of the turn, add 1 to the Damage characteristic of ranged weapons used by friendly **Crypt Flayers** units for attacks that target that enemy unit.

warscrolls.name: Cryptguard
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Musician (1/10), Standard Bearer (1/10), Ward (6+), Death, Flesh-eater Courts, Serfs

abilities.name: Royal Bodyguard
abilities.effect: While any friendly non-**MONSTER** **FLESH-EATER COURTS HEROES** are wholly within this unit’s combat range, both this unit and those **HEROES** have **WARD (5+)**.

abilities.name: Elite Guardians
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.effect: If this unit is in combat with any enemy units that charged this turn, roll a dice. On a 3+, for the rest of the turn, this unit has **STRIKE‑FIRST** but ward rolls cannot be made for it.

warscrolls.name: Grand Justice Gormayne
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Infantry, Ward (6+), Death, Flesh-eater Courts, Abhorrant

abilities.name: Arrest Those Miscreants!
abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, until the start of your next turn, the target has **STRIKE-LAST** while it is in combat with any friendly **FLESH‑EATER COURTS HEROES** and any friendly **SERFS** or **KNIGHTS** units.

abilities.name: Accusations of Regicide
abilities.effect: While you believe this **DELUSION**, add 1 to the Damage characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly **SERFS** and **KNIGHTS** units while they are wholly within 12" of any friendly **FLESH‑EATER COURTS HEROES** that had any damage points allocated to them in the same turn.

warscrolls.name: High Falconer Felgryn
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Infantry, Ward (6+), Death, Flesh‑eater Courts, Abhorrant

abilities.name: Sir Felgryn is Abroad!
abilities.effect: While you believe this **DELUSION**, subtract 10 from the control scores of enemy units while they are in combat with any friendly **SERFS** units or any friendly non-**HERO FLESH‑EATER COURTS MONSTER** or **BEAST** units.

abilities.name: Winged Reconnoitrer
abilities.effect: While this unit’s **Grype** is next to an enemy unit, ward rolls cannot be made for damage points inflicted on that enemy unit by combat attacks made by this unit and friendly **SERFS** units.

abilities.name: Be Mine Eyes
abilities.declare: This unit’s **Grype** is a token. If this unit’s **Grype** is not next to an enemy unit, pick an enemy unit within 18" of this unit and not in combat to be the target.
abilities.effect: Place this unit’s **Grype** next to the target. If the target is destroyed while this unit’s **Grype** is next to it, remove this unit’s **Grype** from the battlefield.

warscrolls.name: Marrowscroll Herald
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Infantry, Ward (6+), Death, Flesh-eater Courts, Noble

abilities.name: The King's Entreaty
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Enemy Charge Phase
abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy unit within 6" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect:
Roll a dice. On a 3+, your opponent must decide whether the target will accept or reject the entreaty offered by this unit.

***Accept:*** The target has the **INFECTED** keyword for the rest of the battle.
***Reject:*** The target has **STRIKE-LAST** for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Infected
abilities.phaseDetails: Reaction: Opponent declared a command, SPELL ability or PRAYER ability for an INFECTED unit
abilities.effect:
Roll a dice. On a 5+:

•  If they declared a command, that command has no effect, it still counts as having been used and the command points spent to use the command are still lost.
•  If they declared a **SPELL** or **PRAYER** ability, that spell or prayer fails.

This reaction can be used more than once per phase but only once per command, **SPELL** ability or **PRAYER** ability.

warscrolls.name: Morbheg Knights
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Cavalry, Champion, Musician (1/3), Standard Bearer (1/3), Fly, Ward (6+), Death, Flesh-eater Courts, Knights

abilities.name: Predator Knights
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Enemy Turn
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Inflict D3 mortal damage on the target. Then, this unit can use a **RETREAT** ability as if it were your movement phase. No mortal damage is inflicted on this unit by that **RETREAT** ability.

warscrolls.name: Nagash, Supreme Lord of the Undead
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Warmaster, Unique, Hero, Monster, Wizard (9), Fly, Ward (5+), Death, Flesh-eater Courts

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, subtract 3 from its power level.

abilities.name: Hand of Dust
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Any Turn
abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy **HERO** or **MONSTER** in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Hide a dice in one of your hands or under one of two appropriate containers. Your opponent must pick one of your hands or containers. If they pick the one hiding the dice, this ability has no effect. If they pick the empty one, the target is automatically destroyed.

abilities.name: Supreme Lord of the Undead
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Your Hero Phase
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly non-**HERO** non-**UNIQUE DEATH** unit that has been destroyed to be the target.
abilities.effect: Set up a replacement unit identical to the target wholly within 12" of this unit and more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Invocation of Nagash
abilities.declare: This unit can cast this spell more than once per phase. Pick a visible unit wholly within 18" of this unit that has not been picked to be the target of this spell this turn to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect:
If the target is an enemy unit, inflict D3 mortal damage on it. If the target is a friendly **DEATH** unit, pick 1 of the following effects:

• Return a number of slain models to the target unit with a combined Health characteristic of up to 3.
• The target has **WARD (5+)** until the start of your next turn.

abilities.name: The Staff of Power
abilities.effect: Add 2 to casting rolls for this unit while it has not miscast any spells this turn. If this unit miscasts a spell, ignore the restriction that would stop this unit from casting any more spells this turn.

abilities.name: Utter Contempt
abilities.effect: This unit ignores the effects of **DELUSION** abilities.

warscrolls.name: Royal Beastflayers
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion (1/10), Ward (6+), Death, Flesh-eater Courts, Serfs

abilities.name: Hunter's Instincts
abilities.effect:
Enemy **MONSTERS** cannot use **RAMPAGE** abilities while they are in combat with this unit.
In addition, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of melee weapons used by enemy **MONSTERS** and **BEAST** units while they are in combat with this unit.

warscrolls.name: Royal Decapitator
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Infantry, Ward (6+), Death, Flesh-eater Courts, Noble

abilities.name: Off With Their Head!
abilities.phaseDetails: Reaction: You declared a FIGHT ability for this unit
abilities.effect: Immediately after that **FIGHT** ability has been resolved, pick an enemy **INFANTRY HERO** in combat with this unit to be the target. Roll 2D6. If the roll exceeds the target’s Health characteristic, it is automatically destroyed.

abilities.name: Executioner's Entourage
abilities.phaseDetails: Reaction: You declared a FIGHT ability for this unit
abilities.effect: Pick a friendly **SERFS** unit that has not used a **FIGHT** ability this turn and is within this unit’s combat range to be the target. The target can be picked to use a **FIGHT** ability immediately after the **FIGHT** ability used by this unit has been resolved. If it is picked to do so, the target’s melee weapons have **Crit (2 Hits)** for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Royal Terrorgheist
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Monster, Fly, Ward (6+), Death, Flesh-eater Courts

abilities.name: Necromantic Limits
abilities.effect:
This unit’s **Skeletal Talons** have a maximum Attacks characteristic of 10.

While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its **Skeletal Talons** is 4.

abilities.name: Shriek of Terror
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy **INFANTRY** unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice for each model in the target unit. For each 6, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target. If 3 or more damage points are allocated to the target by this ability, subtract 1 from hit rolls for the target’s attacks for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Wicked Predator
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: For each champion, standard bearer and musician in the target unit, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit’s **Skeletal Talons**, to a maximum of 10, for the rest of the phase. Those additional attacks must target that enemy unit.

warscrolls.name: Royal Zombie Dragon
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Monster, Fly, Ward (6+), Death, Flesh-eater Courts

abilities.name: Necromantic Limits
abilities.effect:
This unit’s **Draconic Claws** have a maximum Attacks characteristic of 10.

While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its **Draconic Claws** is 5.

abilities.name: On Rotten Wings
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Movement Phase
abilities.effect: Remove this unit from the battlefield and set up it again on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Soaring Terror
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.effect: If this unit charged this turn, roll a dice. On a 3+, this unit can move 2D6". It can pass through the combat ranges of enemy units but must end that move in combat. Then, pick an enemy unit that this unit passed across during that move. Inflict D3 mortal damage on that enemy unit.

warscrolls.name: Scourge of Ghyran Abhorrant Ghoul King
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Wizard (1), Infantry, Ward (6+), Death, Flesh-eater Courts, Abhorrant

abilities.name: The Kings Court
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by other friendly non-**MONSTER FLESH-EATER COURTS HEROES** while they are wholly within 12" of this unit. In addition, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit’s melee weapons for each other friendly non-**MONSTER FLESH-EATER COURTS HERO** wholly within 12" of this unit, to a maximum of +3.

abilities.name: Long Live the King
abilities.effect: If this unit would be destroyed, before removing it from play, friendly non-**UNIQUE FLESH-EATER COURTS** units wholly within 12" of this unit become **enraged** until the start of your next turn. Melee weapons used by friendly enraged units have **Crit (Auto-wound)** and score critical hits on unmodified hit rolls of 5+, even if this unit has been destroyed.

warscrolls.name: Scourge of Ghyran Abhorrant Gorewarden
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Wizard (1), Infantry, Fly, Ward (6+), Death, Flesh-eater Courts, Abhorrant

abilities.name: Swooping Descent
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Enemy Turn
abilities.effect:
Remove this unit from the battlefield, then set it up again more than 9" from all enemy units and either:
• Wholly within 6" of the edge of the battlefield, or
• Within 3" of an objective you do not control.

abilities.name: Glorious Charge
abilities.effect: While this unit is within the combat range of a friendly Knights unit and has charged this turn, this unit has **WARD (5+)** and its **Gory Talons and Fangs** have **Charge (+1 Damage)**.

warscrolls.name: The Grymwatch
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Infantry, Champion, Ward (6+), Death, Flesh-eater Courts, Serfs

abilities.name: Quest to Slay the Monster
abilities.effect: For the rest of the turn, while this unit is in combat with any enemy **MONSTER** or **BEAST** units, it has **STRIKE-FIRST**. However, for the rest of the turn, while it is in combat with any enemy **MONSTER** or **BEAST** units, all of this unit’s combat attacks must target an enemy **MONSTER** or **BEAST** unit.

warscrolls.name: The Skinnerkin
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Infantry, Champion, Ward (6+), Death, Flesh-eater Courts, Serfs

abilities.name: Dinner is Served
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **FLESH-EATER COURTS HERO** wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: **Heal (X)** the target, where **X** is the number of **prime cut points** this unit has. Then, reset this unit’s **prime cut points** to 0.

abilities.name: Prime Cuts
abilities.effect: Each time a combat attack made by this unit scores a critical hit, give 1 **prime cut point** to this unit, to a maximum of 6.

warscrolls.name: Ushoran, Mortarch of Delusion
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Warmaster, Unique, Hero, Monster, Wizard (2), Ward (5+), Death, Flesh-eater Courts, Abhorrant

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its **Monstrous Talons** is 4.

abilities.name: Shroudcage Fragment
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick up to 3 enemy units in combat with this unit to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice for each target. If the roll exceeds the target’s Control characteristic, the target has **STRIKE‑LAST** for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Glimpse of Delusion
abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy model within 18" of this unit to be the target, pick an enemy unit that is visible to the target and within the target’s combat range to be the victim, then make a casting roll of 2D6. You can only pick the target’s unit to be the victim if that unit has 2 or more models.
abilities.effect: Pick 1 of the target’s melee weapons. Immediately resolve combat attacks for the target made with that weapon against the victim.

abilities.name: Epicentre of Delusion
abilities.effect: Each time you make a delusion roll, you can add 1 to or subtract 1 from the roll.

abilities.name: The One True King
abilities.effect:
While you believe this **DELUSION**:

•  Add 1 to run rolls and charge rolls for friendly **FLESH‑EATER COURTS** units.
•  Subtract 1 from run rolls and charge rolls for enemy units.
•  The melee weapons used by friendly **SERFS** units have **Anti-charge (+1 Rend)** while they are wholly within friendly territory and did not charge in the same turn.

warscrolls.name: Varghulf Courtier
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Beast, Ward (6+), Death, Flesh-eater Courts

abilities.name: Beast
abilities.effect: This unit has a maximum control score of 1.

abilities.name: Victory Feast
abilities.effect:
If any models were slain by this unit this turn:

• **Heal (D6)** this unit.

•  If this unit is in combat, this unit can immediately move 10". It can move through the combat ranges of enemy units but must end that move in combat with the units it was already in combat with at the start of the move.

•  If this unit is not in combat, this unit can immediately move 10" but cannot end that move in combat.

rules.name: Raise the Banners
rules.effect: Each time another ability returns at least 1 slain model to a friendly unit that is not in combat, after that ability has been resolved, if that unit is a **SERFS** unit, you can return 1 additional slain model to it, and if it is a **KNIGHTS** unit, roll a dice. On a 4+, you can return 1 additional slain model to it.

rules.name: Sound the Charge
rules.effect: Add 1 to the Rend characteristic of melee weapons used by friendly **KNIGHTS** that charged in the same turn while they are wholly within 12" of any friendly **FLESH‑EATER COURTS HEROES.**

rules.name: Overwhelming Hordes
rules.declare: Pick a friendly **SERFS** unit that did not charge this turn and is in combat to use this ability, then pick an enemy unit in combat with that **SERFS** unit to be the target.
rules.effect: The target cannot make pile-in moves for the rest of the turn.

rules.name: The Blessing of the Chalice
rules.effect: Friendly **FLESH-EATER COURTS HEROES** have **WARD (5+)** if they have destroyed a unit this battle.

rules.name: Indulge, My Pretties
rules.effect:
While a friendly non-**HERO FLESH‑EATER COURTS MONSTER** or **BEAST** is wholly within 12" of any friendly **FLESH‑EATER COURTS HEROES**:

•  That non-**HERO** unit can use a **RAMPAGE** ability on its warscroll even if that ability has already been used by another friendly **MONSTER** in the same turn.
•  If that non-**HERO** unit charged in the same turn and the unmodified charge roll was 9+, it has **STRIKE-FIRST** for the rest of the turn.

rules.name: Like Snapping Hounds
rules.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Any Turn
rules.declare: Pick each friendly **SERFS** unit in combat to be the targets.
rules.effect:
For each target:

• Make a pile-in move.
•  Then, pick an enemy unit in combat with the target and roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on that enemy unit equal to the roll.

spells.name: Deranged Transformation
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **FLESH-EATER COURTS WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a visible friendly **FLESH-EATER COURTS INFANTRY** or **CAVALRY** unit wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect:
Until the start of your next turn:

• Add 2" to the target’s Move characteristic.
• Add 1 to wound rolls for the target’s combat attacks.

spells.name: Charnel Feast
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **FLESH‑EATER COURTS WIZARD** to cast this spell and pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of them to be the target. You can also pick a friendly **SERFS** unit within 6" of the target to be the raised ranks. Then, make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: Inflict D3 mortal damage on the target. For each damage point allocated to the target by this ability, you can return 1 slain model to the raised ranks.

spells.name: Miasma of Madness
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **FLESH-EATER COURTS WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: Until the start of your next turn, for each unmodified hit roll of 1 for a combat attack made by the target, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target after the **FIGHT** ability has been resolved.

spells.name: Charnel Conviction
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **FLESH‑EATER COURTS PRIEST** to chant this prayer, pick a visible friendly **FLESH‑EATER COURTS** unit wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a chanting roll of D6.
spells.effect: Until the start of your next turn, the target has **WARD (5+)**. If the chanting roll was 10+, you can pick another eligible unit to be a second target.

spells.name: Excommunication!
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **FLESH‑EATER COURTS PRIEST** to chant this prayer, pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of them to be the target, then make a chanting roll of D6.
spells.effect: Until the start of your next turn, ignore positive modifiers to save rolls for the target. In addition, if the chanting roll was 10+, ward rolls cannot be made for the target until the start of your next turn.

spells.name: The Summerking's Favour
spells.declare: Pick a friendly **FLESH‑EATER COURTS PRIEST** to chant this prayer, pick a visible friendly **FLESH‑EATER COURTS HERO** wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a chanting roll of D6. You cannot pick **Nagash** to be the target of this prayer.
spells.effect:
Resolve the effect of ‘Renowned Might’ below. If the chanting roll was 10+, resolve the effect of either ‘Renowned Might’ or ‘Righteous Tenacity’ instead.

***Renowned Might:*** Add 1 to the Damage characteristic of the target’s melee weapons for the rest of the turn.

***Righteous Tenacity:*** The target can use 2 **FIGHT** abilities this turn. After the first is used, however, the target has **STRIKE-LAST** for the rest of the turn.

spells.name: Summon Cadaverous Barricade
spells.declare: If there is not a friendly **Cadaverous Barricade** on the battlefield, pick a friendly **FLESH-EATER COURTS WIZARD** to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: Set up a **Cadaverous Barricade** wholly within 18" of the caster and visible to them.

spells.name: Summon Chalice of Ushoran
spells.declare: If there is not a friendly **Chalice of Ushoran** on the battlefield, pick a friendly **FLESH-EATER COURTS WIZARD** to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: Set up a **Chalice of Ushoran** wholly within 12" of the caster and visible to them.

spells.name: Summon Corpsemare Stampede
spells.declare: If there is not a friendly **Corpsemare Stampede** on the battlefield, pick a friendly **FLESH-EATER COURTS WIZARD** to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
spells.effect: Set up a **Corpsemare Stampede** wholly within 12" of the caster, visible to them and more than 9" from all enemy units.

artefacts.name: Charnel Vestments
artefacts.effect: If this unit is not a **PRIEST**, it has **PRIEST (1)**. If this unit is already a **PRIEST**, add 1 to chanting rolls for this unit. If this unit is a **WIZARD**, it cannot use **SPELL** abilities and **PRAYER** abilities in the same phase.

artefacts.name: The Splintered Femur
artefacts.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
artefacts.effect:
Roll a D3. On a 2+, pick 1 of the following:

•  Inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.
•  Subtract 1 from the target’s power level, to a minimum of 0, until the start of your next turn.
•  If the target is a **MANIFESTATION**, it is banished and removed from play.

artefacts.name: The Grisly Pennant
artefacts.declare: If this unit charged this turn, pick an enemy unit in combat with it to be the target.
artefacts.effect:
Roll a dice. If the roll is greater than the target’s Control characteristic or is a 6, the following effects apply for the rest of the turn:

•  Subtract 1 from hit rolls for the target’s combat attacks.
•  Add 1 to hit rolls for combat attacks made by friendly units that target that enemy unit.

artefacts.name: Broken Sceptre of the Solstice
artefacts.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Your Movement Phase
artefacts.declare: Pick a friendly **EQUINOX FEAST** unit that has been destroyed to be the target. This unit can use this ability if it has been destroyed, but if it does, this unit must be the target.
artefacts.effect: Set up a replacement unit identical to the target wholly within 6" of a friendly **EQUINOX FEAST** unit and more than 9" from all enemy units.

artefacts.name: Feted Coronet
artefacts.effect: This unit has **WARD (4+)** until a friendly **NEW SUMMERCOURT** unit is destroyed.

heroicTraits.name: Stronger in Madness
heroicTraits.effect:
Ignore the first damage point that would be allocated to this unit each phase.
In addition, other than the **Companion** weapon ability, weapon abilities for combat attacks that target this unit have no effect.

heroicTraits.name: Cruel Taskmaster
heroicTraits.declare: Pick a friendly non-**HERO FLESH‑EATER COURTS** unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
heroicTraits.effect: For the rest of the turn, you can re-roll charge rolls for the target.

heroicTraits.name: Savage Beyond Reason
heroicTraits.effect: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit’s melee weapons, including **Companion** weapons, if it did not use a **FIGHT** ability in the previous turn. Add 2 to the Attacks characteristic of those weapons instead while this unit has no used a **FIGHT** ability this battle.

heroicTraits.name: Lord of Revelries
heroicTraits.effect: Ignore the first damage point that would be allocated to this unit in each phase.

heroicTraits.name: Tip of the King's Lance
heroicTraits.effect: If this unit charged this turn, it can move 2D6". It can pass through models in enemy units, but it must end that move in combat.

other.name: Horribly Resilient
other.effect: **Heal (D3)** this unit. If this unit is not a **HERO**, **Heal (2D3)** this unit instead.

other.name: Revered Monstrosity
other.effect: Add 1 to hit rolls for combat attacks made with **Companion** weapons by other friendly non‐**UNIQUE FLESH-EATER COURTS MONSTERS** while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

other.name: Savage Abomination
other.effect: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit’s **Companion** melee weapons.

other.name: A Quest Well Done
other.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle (Army), End of Any Turn
other.effect: If the enemy **ENEMY OF THE EVERCHOSEN** unit is destroyed by a unit in this Regiment of Renown, add 10 to the control score of each unit in this Regiment of Renown for the rest of the battle.

other.name: A Deluded Quest
other.declare: Pick an enemy unit to be the target.
other.effect: The target has the **ENEMY OF THE EVERCHOSEN** keyword.

other.name: Dark Hunt
other.effect: In your charge phase, if this unit is not in combat and has not used a **RUN** or **RETREAT** ability in the same turn, it must use the ‘Charge’ ability, and if the charge roll would allow it to end the move within ½" of a visible enemy unit, it must do so.

other.name: Ravenous Shrieks
other.effect: Each time an enemy unit is destroyed by this unit’s shooting attacks, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit’s **Death Shriek** for the rest of the battle (this effect is cumulative).

other.name: Punishment Fits the Crime
other.effect: You believe the ‘Accusations of Regicide’ **DELUSION** (see Grand Justice Gormayne’s warscroll).

other.name: Maddening Radiance
other.effect: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by units in this Regiment of Renown while they are wholly within 12" of the **Ushoran** in this Regiment of Renown.

other.name: Summon Deluded Throngs
other.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle (Army), Your Movement Phase
other.declare: Pick the **Ushoran** in this Regiment of Renown to use this ability, then pick another unit in this Regiment of Renown that has been destroyed to be the target.
other.effect: Set up a replacement unit with half the number of models from the target unit (rounding up) wholly within 6" of a battlefield edge and more than 9" from all enemy units. The replacement unit is part of this Regiment of Renown.

other.name: Deranged Transformation
other.declare: Pick the **Ushoran** in this Regiment of Renown to cast this spell, pick another visible unit in this Regiment of Renown wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
other.effect:
Until the start of your next turn:

• Add 2" to the target’s Move characteristic.
• Add 1 to wound rolls for the target’s combat attacks.

other.name: Urgent Missive
other.effect: Units in this Regiment of Renown can use **CHARGE** abilities even if they used a **RETREAT** ability in the same turn. In addition, no mortal damage is inflicted on units in this Regiment of Renown by **RETREAT** abilities.

battleTraits.name: A Kingdom Deluded
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Start of Any Turn
battleTraits.declare: You must use this ability at the start of each turn. If it is the first turn of the battle, pick a **DELUSION** from these battle traits or, unless otherwise specified, from the warscroll of a friendly unit on the battlefield. If it is not the first turn, make a delusion roll of D6.
battleTraits.effect:
On a delusion roll of 1-2, you must pick a different **DELUSION** to the one you picked last turn. 

On a 3-4, you must pick the same **DELUSION** as the one you picked last turn, even if it is on the warscroll of a unit that has been destroyed. In such cases, the effect of that **DELUSION** applies as if the unit had not been destroyed. 

On a 5-6, you must pick a **DELUSION** like you did in the first turn. For the rest of the turn, you believe the **DELUSION** you picked.

battleTraits.name: A Splendid Pageant
battleTraits.effect:
While you believe this **DELUSION**:

•  Each time a friendly **FLESH‑EATER COURTS** unit wholly within 12" of a friendly **FLESH‑EATER COURTS HERO** uses a **RUN** ability, if you roll a 1-3 when determining the distance that unit can move, you can use a value of 4 instead.
•  While a friendly **FLESH‑EATER COURTS INFANTRY HERO** is within the combat range of a friendly **FLESH‑EATER COURTS INFANTRY** unit that has 5 or more models, that **HERO** is not visible to enemy units more than 6" away.

battleTraits.name: A Glorious Banquet
battleTraits.effect: While you believe this **DELUSION**, add 1 to hit rolls for combat attacks made by friendly **FLESH‑EATER COURTS** units that charged in the same turn while they are wholly within 12" of any friendly **FLESH‑EATER COURTS HEROES**.

battleTraits.name: Royal Blood
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Hero Phase
battleTraits.declare: Pick any number of friendly **ABHORRANTS** to be the targets.

battleTraits.name: Summon Loyal Subjects
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Movement Phase
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly **ABHORRANT** to use this ability, then pick a friendly **SERFS** or **KNIGHTS** unit that has been destroyed to be the target.
battleTraits.effect: Set up a replacement unit with half the number of models from the target unit (rounding up) wholly within 6" of a battlefield edge and more than 9" from all enemy units.

battleTraits.name: Muster Guard
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Movement Phase
battleTraits.declare: Pick any number of friendly **NOBLES** to be the targets.
battleTraits.effect:
For each target, pick 1 of the following:

•  Return up to 3 slain models to a friendly **SERFS** unit wholly within 12" of it.
•  Return 1 slain model to a friendly **KNIGHTS** unit wholly within 12" of it.

The same unit cannot have models returned to it by this ability more than once per turn.

battleTraits.name: Feeding Frenzy
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle (Army), Any Combat Phase
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly **FLESH‑EATER COURTS HERO** in combat to be the target.
battleTraits.effect: For the rest of the turn, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons, including **Companion** weapons, used by friendly **FLESH‑EATER COURTS** units while they are wholly within 12" of the target.

battleTraits.name: The Equinox Parade
battleTraits.effect:
In the first battle round:

•  Add 1 to run rolls for friendly **EQUINOX FEAST** units for each other friendly **EQUINOX FEAST** unit that has used a **RUN** ability this phase.

•  Add D6" to the distance friendly **EQUINOX FEAST** units can move when they use a **RETREAT** ability.

battleTraits.name: A Display of Falconry
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Charge Phase
battleTraits.declare: You can only use this ability in the second battle round. Pick each enemy unit that used a **CHARGE** ability this phase to be the targets.
battleTraits.effect: Roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

battleTraits.name: The Ritual Dance
battleTraits.effect: In the third battle round, while a friendly **EQUINOX FEAST** unit is in combat with an enemy unit that contains any champions, musicians or standard bearers, it can move 6" instead of 3" when it makes a pile-in move.

battleTraits.name: Eat Your Fill!
battleTraits.effect:
In the fourth battle round, each time a friendly **EQUINOX FEAST** unit uses a **FIGHT** ability, after that ability has been resolved:

• If that unit is damaged, **Heal (D3)** that unit.
•  If that unit is not damaged, return up to 3 slain models to it.

battleTraits.name: Make Merry 'Til the Morn
battleTraits.effect: In the fifth battle round, friendly **EQUINOX FEAST** units have **WARD (4+)** while they are within 3" of 2 or more other visible friendly **EQUINOX FEAST** units.

battleTraits.name: The Summerking's Colours
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly **NEW SUMMERCOURT** unit that contains any standard bearers to be the target.
battleTraits.effect:
For the rest of the battle:

•  While the target unit contains any standard bearers, add 10 to the control scores of friendly **NEW SUMMERCOURT** units while they are wholly within 24" of the target.
•  Once all of the standard bearers in the target unit have been slain, subtract 5 from the control scores of friendly **NEW SUMMERCOURT** units.

battleTraits.name: In Their Sire's Shadow
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle (Army), Any Charge Phase
battleTraits.declare: If the friendly **Ushoran** is not in combat and has not used any **RUN** or **RETREAT** abilities this turn, pick him to use this ability. Then, pick up to 2 friendly **NEW SUMMERCOURT KNIGHTS** units within his combat range that are not in combat and have not used a **RUN** or **RETREAT** ability this turn to be his **royal retinue**. Then, make a charge roll of 2D6.
battleTraits.effect: The friendly **Ushoran** can move a distance up to the value of the charge roll. He can move through the combat ranges of enemy units and must end that move within ½" of a visible enemy unit. If he does so, he has charged. If he charged, then after this ability has been resolved, each unit in his **royal retinue** can immediately use the ‘Charge’ ability even if it is not your charge phase and you can use the charge roll from this ability instead of making a charge roll when it does so, but it must end the charge move within 3" of the friendly **Ushoran**.

battleTraits.name: A Duel, Good Sir!
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
battleTraits.declare: You must use this ability if the friendly **Ushoran** is in combat with the enemy general. Pick the enemy general to be the target.
battleTraits.effect:
Your opponent must decide whether the target will accept or refuse Ushoran’s challenge.

***Accept***: For the rest of the turn, when the friendly **Ushoran** and the target are picked to use a **FIGHT** ability, all of their attacks must target each other.

***Refuse***: The target has **STRIKE-LAST** for the rest of the turn.

battleTraits.name: The Knight's Vow
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
battleTraits.declare: Pick each friendly **NEW SUMMERCOURT** unit that did not charge this turn to be the targets.
battleTraits.effect: Start rolling dice, one at a time and one for each target, and stop when you roll a 6. The target you rolled a 6 for can use 2 **FIGHT** abilities this phase. After the first is used, however, the target has **STRIKE-LAST** for the rest of the turn. If you rolled for each target and did not roll a 6, this ability has no effect.

battleTraits.name: Nightmarish Charge
battleTraits.effect: Subtract 1 from hit rolls for combat attacks that target friendly **NEW SUMMERCOURT** units that charged in the same turn.

battleTraits.name: Red Errantry Hosts
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Movement Phase
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly **KNIGHTS** unit that has been destroyed to be the target.
battleTraits.effect: Set up a replacement unit with half the number of models from the target unit (rounding up) wholly within friendly territory, wholly within 6" of a battlefield edge and more than 9" from all enemy units.
